data.name: The Last Path
data.detailed_description: Journey through decayed lands infested with deadly creatures and falling human civilization. Everything grows in difficulty over time. As you kill enemies, explore, and solve puzzles, you'll find valuable loot which will help keep you alive. Travel as far as you can through the snow, desert, and forest before you inevitably die. Danger is around every corner. Continuing on the path is your only hope. Play in singleplayer or cooperate with up to 4 players.
data.about_the_game: Journey through decayed lands infested with deadly creatures and falling human civilization. Everything grows in difficulty over time. As you kill enemies, explore, and solve puzzles, you'll find valuable loot which will help keep you alive. Travel as far as you can through the snow, desert, and forest before you inevitably die. Danger is around every corner. Continuing on the path is your only hope. Play in singleplayer or cooperate with up to 4 players.
data.short_description: A ruthless looting & shooting survival rogue-like FPS for 1-4 players, set in a procedurally-generated world. Slay hordes, bandits, and bosses. Setup traps, research, craft, and upgrade gear across multiple biomes in order to stay alive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended or expect longer than average load times.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended.

content_descriptors.notes: Killing monsters and human bandits. Gore and blood.
